gettingStarted.title: Welcome to KriptoLab!
gettingStarted.introduction1: KriptoLab is a beginner-friendly Crypto Trading Simulator that allows you to practice trading using real market data from Indodax without any financial risk.
gettingStarted.introduction2: This guide will walk you through setting up your account and getting started. By the end of this tutorial, you'll be able to:
gettingStarted.createAccountDesc: Start your KriptoLab journey by creating a free account to save your progress and begin trading.
gettingStarted.createAccountStep1: Go to the KriptoLab website and locate the Register button in the top-right corner.
gettingStarted.createAccountStep2: Fill out the registration form with:
gettingStarted.createAccountStep3: Click the Create Account button to complete registration.
gettingStarted.createAccountField3: A secure password (minimum 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters)
gettingStarted.alternativeStep2: Select the Google account you want to use.
gettingStarted.alternativeStep3: Follow the prompted steps to complete your registration.
gettingStarted.loginDesc: Access your KriptoLab account and start your trading simulation.
gettingStarted.loginStep1: Click the Login button in the top-right corner.
gettingStarted.loginStep2: Enter your registered email and password.
gettingStarted.loginStep3: Click the Login button to access your account.
gettingStarted.forgotPasswordTitle: Forgot Your Password? Follow these steps:
gettingStarted.forgotStep1: On the login page, click the Forgot Password link.
gettingStarted.forgotStep4: Check your email inbox (including spam folder) for the reset link.
